name: RatingGroup.Root
description: Allows users to rate items using a set of icons.
description_zh: Allows users to rate items using a set of icons.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the rating group when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the rating group.
defaultValue.description_zh:
首次呈现评级组时的初始值。
当您不需要控制评级组的状态时使用。

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input element.
form.description_zh: 基础 input 元素的 associate 形式。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  label: string
  hiddenInput: string
  control: string
  item(id: string): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the rating. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 评级中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

name.description: The name attribute of the rating element (used in forms).
name.description_zh: rating 元素的 name 属性（在表单中使用）。

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states
translations.description_zh: 指定标识辅助功能元素及其状态的本地化字符串

events.name: hoverChange
events.description: Function to be called when the rating value is hovered.
events.description_zh: 悬停评分值时调用的函数。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.
events.description_zh: 当 model 值更改时触发回调。

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Function to be called when the rating value changes.
events.description_zh: 当评分值发生变化时调用的函数。
